SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(click_date),'-',MONTH(click_date)) AS m,IFNULL(b.con,0) AS c FROM(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d') AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 4 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 5 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 8 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 9 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 10 MONTH) AS click_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-',1,'-',1) , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 11 MONTH) AS click_date) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS con , CONCAT(YEAR(od_date),'-',MONTH(od_date)) AS mon FROM `order_detail` WHERE od_gid = #{gid} GROUP BY mon) b ON CONCAT(YEAR(click_date),'-',MONTH(click_date))=b.mon
SELECT g.g_name as gname,COUNT(od_gid) as gcount FROM order_detail o INNER JOIN goods g ON o.od_gid=g.g_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.od_date,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y') GROUP BY od_gid,g_name
